languages.text: "А то, Лорд-капитан!" {n}Идира заметно оживляется, а ее взгляд становится немного мечтательным, пока она припоминает одну из своих историй.{/n}
"You bet I do, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira becomes much more animated and her expression turns slightly dreamy as she recalls one of her stories.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А то, Лорд-капитан!" {n}Идира заметно оживляется, а ее взгляд становится немного мечтательным, пока она припоминает одну из своих историй.{/n}

languages.text: “可不是嘛，舰长大人！”{n}伊迪拉变得充满活力。当她回忆起那个故事时，她的表情微微带着梦幻的色彩。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You bet I do, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira becomes much more animated and her expression turns slightly dreamy as she recalls one of her stories.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛，舰长大人！”{n}伊迪拉变得充满活力。当她回忆起那个故事时，她的表情微微带着梦幻的色彩。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "You bet I do, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira becomes much more animated and her expression turns slightly dreamy as she recalls one of her stories.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Pues claro, Lord Capitán!». {n}Idira se anima visiblemente y su expresión se vuelve ligeramente soñadora mientras recuerda una de sus historias.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You bet I do, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira becomes much more animated and her expression turns slightly dreamy as she recalls one of her stories.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Pues claro, Lord Capitán!». {n}Idira se anima visiblemente y su expresión se vuelve ligeramente soñadora mientras recuerda una de sus historias.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「もちろんそうするわ、ロード・キャプテン！」{n}イディラは少し元気を取り戻し、その表情は物語を思い起こすときのようにわずかに夢見がちになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You bet I do, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira becomes much more animated and her expression turns slightly dreamy as she recalls one of her stories.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんそうするわ、ロード・キャプテン！」{n}イディラは少し元気を取り戻し、その表情は物語を思い起こすときのようにわずかに夢見がちになった。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Und ob, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira wird viel lebhafter und ihre Miene nimmt einen leicht verträumten Ausdruck an, als sie eine ihrer Geschichten zum Besten gibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You bet I do, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira becomes much more animated and her expression turns slightly dreamy as she recalls one of her stories.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und ob, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira wird viel lebhafter und ihre Miene nimmt einen leicht verträumten Ausdruck an, als sie eine ihrer Geschichten zum Besten gibt.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Oh oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}L'expression d'Idira s'illumine alors qu'elle se remémore l'une de ses histoires avec un air rêveur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You bet I do, Lord Captain!" {n}Idira becomes much more animated and her expression turns slightly dreamy as she recalls one of her stories.{/n}

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Olmaz olur mu Lord Kaptan!" {n}İdira'nın neşesi bir hayli yerine geliyor. Hikâyelerinden birini anımsarken yüzünde hafiften hülyalı bir ifade beliriyor.{/n}
